If you arrive via Greyhound, the bus station is part of the Pilot

Because Effingham is situated at the intersection of 2 highways, there are a lot of fast food restaurants and some sit down chains as well.  For a local restaurant try Niemerg's Steak House which is located at 1410 W. Fayette Road.

value: Comfort Inn Effingham Hotel  1304 W. Evergreen Drive.  (217) 347-5050.  Located at exit #160, close to restaurants.
Comfort Suites Effingham Hotel 1310 W. Fayette Rd.  (217) 342-3151.  Comprises three stories with 60 deluxe sleeping rooms, 3 hot tub suites, and 2 Presidential suites with Jacuzzi and fireplace.
Econo Lodge Effingham Hotel 1600 W. Fayette Ave.  (217) 342-4161.  Located near Mid America Direct, Krispy Kreme Factory, The Cross in Effingham, and several printing press operations.
